### Expected result

### Actual result

### Nextcloud log
<details>
<summary>Nextcloud log</summary>

```
 - Open the Nextcloud admin settings
 - Open the "Log" section
 - Click the "Copy" icon, then Copy Raw
```
</details>

### Browser log
<details>
<summary>Browser log</summary>

```
Press F12, copy the content of the console tab
```
</details>
